name: Ooze (BigSpaceWorm)
description:
A basic system for an action RPG. Has a basic attack and a magic one. The health bar shows half and full hearts and adds another if the player finds a heart container. The magic bar regenerates and the blobs have a 50% chance of dropping a random potion.

The "plot" of the game is that the mage is trying to escape the dungeon after everyone disappeared, trying to follow the theme of the jam: "free". Ironically, there is no way right now to get out of the dungeon.

KNOWN BUG:

If you talk to the guy in the cell twice the game will softlock. I spent most of the last day trying to fix it but I only got a headache. They just hate me, its literally their fault that the mage can't escape.

CREDITS:

  • I heavily relied on the Godot tutorial made by Davide Pesce so most of what I did was to read the documentation on the things he showed.

  • The intro and death music is "In Dreams" By Three Chain Links CC BY 3.0
  • The in game music is “Misty Cave”, from PlayOnLoop.com CC BY 4.0
  • Sound effects from Media College
  • The tileset is edited from Roguelike Cave & Dungeons pack by Kenney Vleugels
